email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: 8500MT of Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are looking to charter a vessel for the shipment of 8500MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for this route? The laycan window we are targeting is between October 10 and October 20.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Ocean Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 8500MT of Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV SEA HORIZON, which has a DWT of 120,000 and an LOA of 250m. The initial freight quote is $45 per metric ton. The vessel is currently in Singapore and can be positioned to Newcastle for your laycan window.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 8500MT of Coal - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of $45 per metric ton is slightly higher than our budget. Given the current market conditions, could you consider revising the rate to $42 per metric ton? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and laytime details?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Ocean Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 8500MT of Coal - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of $43 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be $15,000 per day, and the laytime will be 5 days. The laycan window remains October 10 to October 20.

Please confirm if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 8500MT of Coal - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the rate of $43 per metric ton and the demurrage rate of $15,000 per day. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements and confirm the laytime start and end dates.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Ocean Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: 8500MT of Coal - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your confirmation. The laytime will start on October 10 and end on October 15. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
John Doe
Maritime Charterers
